thread.section_title: Nevada Corporate Headquarters, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nevada Corporate Headquarters, Inc. | nchinc.com
thread.title: Lenore Mohr
thread.title_full: Nevada Corporate Headquarters, Inc. reviewed by Lenore Mohr

author: Lenore Mohr
title: Lenore Mohr
text: We had several choices for a payroll service and after speaking to Vicky Long, it became clear that ADP was the best choice for our business. Real estate investing has many rules and regulations and Vicky's market knowledge was exceptional - plus she was familiar with the rules of our state in Pennsylvania. She also guided us on how much we should be paying ourselves as members of the LLC. She responded with lightening speed and was highly efficient and friendly. It was a great experience and I highly recommend using her for setting up payroll in the complicated web of real estate investing.
